text:
Paull Shin (Shin Hobom, Korean: 신호범; born September 27, 1935) is an American politician. He was a member of the Washington State Senate from 1999 to 2014. He was the first Korean American ever elected to the Washington State Legislature.
Shin is a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Paju, South Korea.
In January 2014, Shin was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.
